channel.title: "new years Quest"
channel.description:
ok then i am currently working on a "New Years Quest" does any one have any suggestions? i have a few ideas but not loads so i need lot more please post your suggestion here [u][b][size=12pt]Quest WILL BE released!![/size][/b][/u] [u][b]Suggestions so far[/b][/u] > Fireworks GFX (solved on how to code) > Collect fire work materials (solved on how to code) > Make Fire Works (solved on how to code) > > Random npcs that come up to you and give you something > kegs - get drunk ;D > a shop that gives fireworks and a random thats for newyears only > firelighter shop so that you can only access it after quest > > > MAYBE MORE TO COME :| > > > Im loving this one but is the firelighters released in the newest cache out for private server?
fairies steal the firework materials so u have to go and disquise ureself as one to steal them. then u get cought and go to fairy jail. then u have to "sweet" talk the prison guard to get out. then go back and steal the fireworks. u could make stealing the fireworks something like a random thing. then after u steal the fireworks bring them to whichever npc u have to talk to and then add the code in the tutorial for a concert and have fireworks all over the place. then after u finish the quest u can use a firelighter (any color) to make fireworks above ure head ill refrase it all 1.fairies steal fireworks and u need to get them back 2.get a fairy disguise 3.go to fairy hideout (possibly ham local) 4.steal fireworks (random can steal or cant steal) 5.go to fairy jail 6."sweet talk" the fairy guard for key 7.bring the stuff back to the npc guy 8.a fairy followed u back so they send a hellhoud after u 9.kill it finish quest 10.see a concert with fireworks (use the fireworks code in the tutorial list) 11.after quest done u get a firelighter (any color) to make fireworks over ure head or like in front of u =]

item.title: "new years Quest"
item.dc:creator: @Try_Me Try Me
item.description:
@Try_Me wrote:

[quote author=iceman21 link=topic=46287.msg566525#msg566525 date=1165193576]
fairies steal the firework materials so u have to go and disquise ureself as one to steal them. then u get cought and go to fairy jail. then u have to “sweet” talk the prison guard to get out. then go back and steal the fireworks. u could make stealing the fireworks something like a random thing. then after u steal the fireworks bring them to whichever npc u have to talk to and then add the code in the tutorial for a concert and have fireworks all over the place. then after u finish the quest u can use a firelighter (any color) to make fireworks above ure head
ill refrase it all

1.fairies steal fireworks and u need to get them back
2.get a fairy disguise
3.go to fairy hideout (possibly ham local)
4.steal fireworks (random can steal or cant steal)
5.go to fairy jail
6.“sweet talk” the fairy guard for key
7.bring the stuff back to the npc guy
8.a fairy followed u back so they send a hellhoud after u
9.kill it finish quest
10.see a concert with fireworks (use the fireworks code in the tutorial list)
11.after quest done u get a firelighter (any color) to make fireworks over ure head or like in front of u =]

tuppatsch:

^^ runescape needs people like u

They defently do!

Read full topic

item.title: "new years Quest"
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Skill Pure Skill
item.description:
@Pure_Skill wrote:

omg great ideas i got 1 its new years eve ur walking a long with ur party hats and then u see a black knight runing a way with a package u follo him to a cave u go in side and u see santa and the easter bunny and the blood fairys with the black knights at a meeting around a big table and on the bighest chair is zamorak he says our plain is working now we can stop the big party that saradomin has made for new years eve and make our new evil party were only follows of zamorak are a loude then the black knight comes in with the package he says yes i git it sir he opens it and its the fire works u think to ur self how can i get it then they put it into a room and lock it a knight takes a key and wealks a way u follo the knight and u say hi he says get out u offa him a beer he takes it and drinks it he falls a sleep u steel the fire works and run santa chases u and u kill him him then u get to the party u light them then u get them for doing the quest after that u can buy them and light them they go over ur head and stuff like the others sed and thats it. hope u like my idea[br][size=1]Posted at: December 04, 2006, 12:43:42 AM[/size][hr]no afense to zamorak hes the best god and no afense to santa easter bunny blood fairys and the black knights ty[br][size=1]Posted at: December 04, 2006, 12:44:56 AM[/size][hr]hope u guys like it

Read full topic

item.title: "new years Quest"
item.dc:creator: @samuraiblood2 samuraiblood2
item.description:
@samuraiblood2 wrote:

[quote=“danieb, post:16, topic:31827”]ooh i got a cool idea. the fireworks dude who usually sells them on christmas got assasinated on the 23rd 2 days b4 the chritmas concert celebration. the sheriff deputy dan is on the case thinking of what had happened this is when u start the christmas adventure. you have to sneek into the government lords desk room place and steal all the government files you then return to the scene to study the evidence. you find a knife in the bushes nearby with a tip of blood on the end you match the dna in the dna lab of the owner who got stabbed 450 times b4 dieing. you find fingerprints of the killer on the handle and find out it was the sheriffs handprints. you return to finnd the sheriff dead behind the stall of the dead owners shop. you find a small hole to the righht of the cdrime scene heading into a underground lair. after exploring and dodgeing the guards you find the fairy headquarters far into the hole. you realise that there killer elves and try to run when your escaping you are blindewd by light but in a feint glimpse you se a dark magic power destropying all the elves. you ask him for his name and he doesnt say anything but mutter and enchant. you return to the surface after killing some fairies and run the fireworks store in time for the concert you explain how the fireworks owner and the sheriff was controlled by the blood fairies and how the dark magic guy came and they had a cool concert in honour of their friend the fireworks owner. after the concert you can purchase fireworks from the store for 25gp ea and they are fired in the air and explode above your head. =p[br][size=1]Posted at: December 03, 2006, 08:21:14 PM[/size][hr]who likes my idea?[/quote]lol funny you must be bored

Read full topic

item.title: "new years Quest"
item.dc:creator: @danieb danieb
item.description:
@danieb wrote:

ooh i got a cool idea. the fireworks dude who usually sells them on christmas got assasinated on the 23rd 2 days b4 the chritmas concert celebration. the sheriff deputy dan is on the case thinking of what had happened this is when u start the christmas adventure. you have to sneek into the government lords desk room place and steal all the government files you then return to the scene to study the evidence. you find a knife in the bushes nearby with a tip of blood on the end you match the dna in the dna lab of the owner who got stabbed 450 times b4 dieing. you find fingerprints of the killer on the handle and find out it was the sheriffs handprints. you return to finnd the sheriff dead behind the stall of the dead owners shop. you find a small hole to the righht of the cdrime scene heading into a underground lair. after exploring and dodgeing the guards you find the fairy headquarters far into the hole. you realise that there killer elves and try to run when your escaping you are blindewd by light but in a feint glimpse you se a dark magic power destropying all the elves. you ask him for his name and he doesnt say anything but mutter and enchant. you return to the surface after killing some fairies and run the fireworks store in time for the concert you explain how the fireworks owner and the sheriff was controlled by the blood fairies and how the dark magic guy came and they had a cool concert in honour of their friend the fireworks owner. after the concert you can purchase fireworks from the store for 25gp ea and they are fired in the air and explode above your head. =p[br][size=1]Posted at: December 03, 2006, 08:21:14 PM[/size][hr]who likes my idea?

Read full topic
